title: Alan Thicke
summary: Alan Thicke (born Alan Willis Jeffrey; 1 March 1947 –  13 December 2016) was a Canadian actor, songwriter, and game and talk show host. He is the father of singer Robin Thicke. In 2013, Thicke was inducted into Canada's Walk of Fame. Thicke was best known for playing Dr. Jason Seaver on the 1980s sitcom Growing Pains.
